column4: can anyone help me? in intrepid I can connect to and ping other computers on the network but I can't use the internet
how are you getting your ip address?
check /etc/resolv.conf has an appropriate name server
hmm this is weird, my net has started working again, this happened before too, it just randomly starts working and then stops
you have a dodgey router or network switch...
everything worked fine until i upgraded to intrepid, and the internet works fine on other computers on the network
are you using network manager to do your networking?
configure your network manually for dhcp
what do you mean? do you mean using a static ip address?
no, use dhcp... hmm... that's right intrepid doesn't let you configure manually...
So any ideas on what to do?
have you got wireless as well?
nope, right now I'm using another computer as a proxy to access the internet
check your syslog/messages to see if your nic is going up and down
What should I be looking for, I see some messages about DHCP but thats it
